org.coniks.coniks_test_client

Class ClientConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.coniks.coniks_test_client.ClientConfig

  • public class ClientConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Sets various configuration parameters for a CONIKS client.

      • readClientConfig

        public static boolean readClientConfig(java.io.File configFile,
                       boolean isFullOp)
        Set a TestClient's configuration according to the parameters in configFile. The client has already checked that configFile exists, but the parameters in the File may still be malformed. If the client is being tested, this will skip the truststore parameters.
        Parameters:
        configFile - the client configuration file
        isFullOp - indicates whether the client is being run in full operation mode or testing mode
        Returns:
        true if the config file can be read in successfully, false if an exception occurs, which will cause the client to halt.
